桊字的基本解释

桊
juàn
穿在牛鼻子上的小铁环或小木棍儿：牛鼻桊儿。

桊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［juàn］
［《廣韻》居倦切，去線，見。］
拴牛鼻子的器物。用小铁环或两端较粗中间略细的小木棍做成。

桊字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　桊； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页525第11
【唐韻】居倦切【集韻】古倦切，?音眷。【說文】牛鼻上環。【廣韻】牛拘也。　又【玉篇】居媛切。義同。　又【集韻】驅圓切，音弮。屈木盂也。

桊字的源字形

小篆楷体

桊字的起名意思

暂无。

桊
Basic explanation of words
桊
juàn
The small iron ring or small wooden stick worn on the nose of the cow: the nose of the cow.
桊
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［juàn］
["Guangyun" is tired and cut, go to the line, see you. ]
Utensils for tying a cow's nose. It is made of small iron rings or small wooden sticks with thicker ends and slightly thinner middle.
桊
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　桊; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 525 No. 11
[Tang Yun] Ju tired cut [Ji Yun] Ancient tired cut,? Sound family. [Said the text] Bull nose upper ring. [Guang Yun] Niu Ju also.　[Jade articles] Ju Yuan cut. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Drive round and cut, sound. Qu Mu Yu also.
桊
